The following tables display the [[Gauge Unit Theory|gauge unit]] application of character talents. The symbols 1A, 2B, 4C refer to the decay types.<ref>Community Document:  [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uiJje5yqv7v2UKrWoBAgBMrHrrNemtkooo8JqAGJpP8/edit#gid=0 Elemental Gauges]</ref><ref>NGA: [https://ngabbs.com/read.php?tid=23836189&_ff=650&rand=458 [数据讨论]<nowiki>[提瓦特大学] 全角色施加元素的附着时间(</nowiki>2.6更新完毕)]</ref>

* 1A: applies a 1 gauge unit aura, which decays in 9.5 seconds
* 2B: applies a 2 gauge unit aura, which decays in 12 seconds
* 4C: applies a 4 gauge unit aura, which decays in 17 seconds
